reviewsJson.markdown:
Setup: Magma Clone, Ni200, cotton, 240-260Celsius

Testing: Inawera Vanilla Cream 2%, steeped 5 days

Description:  

* Smell: creamy vanilla, little bit of sweetness
* Taste: Inhale is very creamy with vanilla accents 
 The exhale is creamy, has vanilla and hints of cotton candy. The vanilla notes are light and sweet. Mouthfeel is weird, it leaves a sweet, fatty feeling.

Off-flavors: Feint floralness, not existent at 1% and below

Throat hit: None, maybe a bit dry  
  
Toughts:  
A very light flavour that that should read as "Vanilla **Cream**", the creaminess is pronounced and its a very mixable falvour, not a good standalone.  
I tried  

*  1% Vanilla Cream IW  
*  1.5% Spearmint Cap  

And love it.  
Also very good milk/cream base, no need for meringue/sweet cream mixes, this one does good.
reviewsJson.author: ihatetoridethebus
reviewsJson.title: Vanilla Cream
